formalpara.title: Figure 1. WormBase synteny browser.
formalpara.para: A comparative view of syntenic regions of two genomes-C. elegans and C. briggsae genomes-is displayed in the browser. Also displayed are gene models contained within these genomic regions in both genomes and alignment details. Users can browse along genomic sequences by clicking on the Zoom/Scroll errors or modifying the genomic coordinates.
